text: Angélica Espinoza Stransky (born Mexico City, Mexico, July 11, 1953), better known as Angélica Aragón (), is a Mexican film, theater and television actress, daughter of the famous actor José Ángel Espinoza "Ferrusquilla", who has starred in different Mexican films such as Cilandro y parejil, Sexo, pudor y lágrimas, El crimen del Padre Amaro, and in American films such as A Walk in the Clouds and Dirty Dancing: Havana Nights and in telenovelas such as Vivir un Poco and Mirada de Mujer.
